description: Synthetic policy outlining billing and payment procedures.

sections.title: Accepted Payment Methods
sections.text: We accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, wire transfers, and select alternative payment methods depending on region.

sections.title: Billing Cycles
sections.text: Subscriptions are billed on a recurring monthly or annual basis unless manually canceled.

sections.title: Overdue Payments
sections.text: Accounts with overdue balances may have services restricted until the outstanding amount is settled.
